channel.title: Did anyone else get a phishing e-mail titled "Password Recovery from Jagex"?
channel.description: It had a link to services-runescaqe.com, with some session bullshit.

item.title: Did anyone else get a phishing e-mail titled "Password Recovery from Jagex"?
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Free trade has brought the scammers back to play.

I got 3 of these emails, they looked exactly like Ollie’s

item.title: Did anyone else get a phishing e-mail titled "Password Recovery from Jagex"?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I’ve gotten at least 5+. Someone probably wrote a program that crawls popular runescape sites for publicly displayed email addresses and then writes an email from there.

protip: if its in your spam folder, its not from jagex.

Read full topic
item.source: Did anyone else get a phishing e-mail titled "Password Recovery from Jagex"?

item.title: Did anyone else get a phishing e-mail titled "Password Recovery from Jagex"?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Dear Player, We regret to inform you that your account has received an infraction due to a Major Real World Trading offense. Please visit the appeal section under Account Management to view evidence of your infraction(s) and to appeal any infraction(s) that you feel were unjustified. To view the evidence please click here: http://www.services-runescaqe.com/m=webloginform.ws.htmmod=offence-appeal&ssl=1&expired=0&dest=account_history.ws.html Please note: Due to a recent bug in our infraction system, some accounts may have received a void infraction. The majority of void infractions have been removed but we cannot ensure that all infractions have been removed. We urge you to visit the appeal section to appeal any unjustified infractions received due to system errors. Many thanks, Jagex Ltd. Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and trademarks used in other countries of the world. By using our service you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

not formatted properly /fail

Read full topic
